participant_2.background:
I train to stay in peak physical condition for my job.
I was a computer programmer before I started my own business.
I cannot be a florist because I would not be able to see the colors of the flowers.
I'm looking for a place to live that is close to the Y so I can continue my swimming routine.
I love spending time with my family, especially taking my son to the zoo to see koalas.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm excited to be starting my own business, but I'm also nervous about it.
I'm sure you'll do great! What kind of business is it?
It's a personal training business. I'm a certified personal trainer and I'm excited to help people get in shape.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be very successful.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love spending time with my family, especially my son. We love going to the zoo to see the koalas.
Aww, that's so sweet! I love koalas too.
Me too! They're so cute and cuddly.
What else do you like to do?
I also enjoy fishing and playing sports.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've never been fishing before.
You should try it! It's really relaxing.
Maybe I will! Thanks for the suggestion!
